content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM systems are tightly bound to and integrated with each other, which allows the company to operate smoothly as one team. Therefore, it is important to understand each system and its purpose.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://library.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Electronic Library\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – is the company's e-library, where you can find software, books, audio/video resources, and other useful items.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA (EPAM Utilization and Project Staffing Analyzer)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – is the system for the company's staff management, workload planning for projects, and for controlling processes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Service Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – is the system for employee technical support where you can submit a request in order to request a work verification or other official company letter, to have your equipment repaired, to get an ID-card, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcmsq.epam.com/pmc/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PMC (Project Management Center)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – is the system for project planning, risk management, software development, product quality control, quantitative project management, and processes testing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://svnmsq.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SVN (Subversion) \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– is a free centralized version control system.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcmsq.epam.com/eww/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPIS (EPAM Information System)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – is the system for vacation planning and accounting. With the help of EPIS, you create a vacation request and receive manager's approval. EPIS is available \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"only\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in Internet Explorer.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pmcpct.epam.com/ctc/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CTC (Cost Tracking Center) \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"– is a web-application to collect and control information regarding company expenses (business trips, product and service purchases, other expenditures).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Process Asset Library (PAL)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – is an internal information resource created to provide access to the approved and existing Quality Management System (QMS) documents in EPAM Systems. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://status.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"STATUS\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – a system that allows you to view online the performance and availability status of key internal applications and services. Besides monitoring the statuses, you have the ability to view reports on ongoing and planned temporary shutdowns of services and applications (SIN - Service Interrupt Notifications), subscribe to receive notifications about the unavailability of certain applications/services, etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please direct your questions about this section to your manager or mentor.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
